text: The 1762 English cricket season was the 19th season following the earliest known codification of the Laws of Cricket. Details have survived of eight eleven-a-side matches between significant teams. ==Matches== Eight eleven-a- side match between significant teams are known to have taken place.Other matches in England 1762, CricketArchive. Retrieved 2019-02-10. *21 June - Guildford v Chertsey - Merrow Down *19 July - Surrey v Kent - Carshalton *30 August - London v Kent - Artillery Ground *30 August - Chertsey v Middlesex - Laleham Burway *7 September - Middlesex v Chertsey - Moulsey Hurst *13 September - Rest of Surrey v Chertsey - Ripley Green *21 September - London & Middlesex v Chertsey & Dartford - Hampton Court Green *27 September - Chertsey & Dartford v London & Middlesex - Laleham Burway ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * Category:1762 in English cricket Category:English cricket seasons from 1598 to 1763
title: 1762 English cricket season
